chats.text: Concern about high intensity minutes on Garmin due to POTS/long COVID.
Acknowledged concern; doctor will review your case.
Post-onboarding plan: Lifestyle Consultation with Dr Advik.
My current health management feels random and uncoordinated.
Requesting access to past cardiology records.
Can't access the workout plan—password issue.
We will investigate high intensity minutes further.
After a month, no tangible impact; service feels sluggish.
You should track if I've been to the gym.
Clarifying founder vs customer comments; WhatsApp vs Slack?
We are consolidating the plan and priorities.
Plan lacks prioritization and why behind recommendations.
Workout was scheduled at wrong time; I missed it.
Workout invitations lack context of goals and metrics.

episodes.title: Episode 1: Initial Health Inquiry & Onboarding
episodes.goal: Address high intensity minutes (Garmin) with POTS/long COVID.
episodes.persona_before: Proactive and data-driven; feels management is random/uncoordinated. [4]
episodes.persona_after: Engaged with Elyx, shared data; awaiting consultation. [2][3]

decisions.title: Lifestyle Consultation with Dr Advik
decisions.description: First step to review lifestyle factors and POTS context.

reasons.text: Member concern about high intensity minutes.
Team acknowledged and proposed a plan.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Clarification, Data Gathering & Initial Workout Plan
episodes.goal: Clarify intensity targets, gather medical records, share workout plan.
episodes.outcome: Information provided; plan in motion (records + hotel gym plan).
episodes.persona_after: More involved; starting to hit friction (communication, accessibility).
friction_points: Had to ask who is messaging (concierge number). [5]
Requested access to past medical records. [6]

decisions.title: Collect Past Medical Records
decisions.description: Needed cardiology history to contextualize intensity minutes.

episodes.title: Episode 3: Member Dissatisfaction & Service Feedback
episodes.outcome: Acknowledgment & promise to improve; consolidate plan.
episodes.persona_after: Frustrated; taking directive role with explicit feedback.
friction_points: Expect proactivity in tracking activity levels. [11]

decisions.title: Consolidated Plan & Priorities
decisions.description: Neel to consolidate ongoing work into clear plan.

reasons.text: Member's strong feedback on sluggish progress.

episodes.title: Episode 4: Health Optimization Plan & Continued Feedback
episodes.goal: Provide optimization plan and iterate with feedback.
episodes.persona_after: Continues to give critical feedback; seeking clarity and context.
friction_points: Plan not comprehensive; lacks prioritization and 'why'. [14]
Workout scheduled without time preference; missed session. [15]

decisions.title: Health Optimization Plan
decisions.description: Deliver plan; improve clarity on 'why' and priorities.
